text: if there's one Vietnamese soup that
everyone will love doesn't matter

need three ingredients which are 200
gram of beef I like using beef with bits

and without overcooking the beef you
also lived in good grammar pickled

one large one you cut the tomatoes into
wedges now we're gonna season the beef
with a teaspoon of minced garlic a
teaspoon of minced shallots 1/2 a
teaspoon of stock powder about 2 TSP or
fish sauce
also add some pepper and then mix well
and set aside for about 15 minutes you
want to cut them pickled mustard greens
into about 2 inch lengths and then rinse
under water to reduce the sourness now
in a saucepan on medium heat add about a
tablespoon of vegetable oil and then
stir fry the beef until it's no longer
pink I fry some mince garlic and
shallots until fragrant and then I have
to be
now when the myth is no longer pain we
can add in the tomatoes
and also adding the mustard greens
stuff right everything for about two to
three minutes and then we can add 1
liter of water that's about 4 cups add a

high to bring it to a boy when it's boys
again you can have a taste and adjust
you can adjust to your tails with some
office sauce or chicken stock
the soup is nice and sour but if it more
sour than you want you can add a little
bit of sugar to balance out okay it's
